# iAM.COTS

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->
iAMCOTS implements an extended Children-of-Twins (COTS) model with
indirect assortative mating, spouses, and two offspring per nuclear family.
The model is estimated in OpenMx and supports MZ, DZ, full-sibling,
half-sibling, and unknown-zygosity family structures.
